Dm Bb Gm Bb Am7 Hail, the God song! Dm Bb Gm Bb Am7 All trill to the tune devout reprise! Dm Bb Gm Bb Am7 Hail, the eon! Dm Bb Gm Bb Am7 We nelt on this slab the blessed people!
Dm Em/D Dm G F Dm Em/D Am/D Em7 F
Dm C G Dm We fought for the fable, aha! C G Dm But instead we burn C G Dm And in the end of time, aha! C G Dm Left an empty urn

Dm Bb Gm Bb Am7 Hail, the maker! Dm Bb Gm Bb Am7 A noisy device to take the toll! Dm Bb Gm Bb Am7 God forsake her! Dm Bb Gm Bb Am7 For the songs that she sang have left god's acre!
